alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chemung; Chenango; Delaware; Otsego; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 09 at 12:34PM EST until March 09 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches. * WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Bradford, Susquehanna and Northern Wayne counties. In New York, Chemung, Chenango, Otsego, Tioga, Broome and Delaware counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...A Winter Storm Warning for heavy snow means heavy snow is expected or occurring. Heavy snow is forecast that will make travel very dangerous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow heavy at times will continue through the afternoon and taper off by early evening. Snowfall rates will reach up to 2 inches per hour at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission strongly encourage motorist to heed all travel restrictions and delay unnecessary travel. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadways, and traffic conditions.

area.areaDesc: Broome; Chemung; Chenango; Delaware; Otsego; Tioga
